overview: This is the story of touring musician, Jeff Mix, who finds himself at the Gateway Motel, in the  same city he got hitched in. That evening a gun shot rings out. Someone will lose their  life. With so many shady people, the shot could be meant for any one of them. The prostitute,  the motel manager, the mob guy, the conÂ­man, the mysterious man in search of a woman  and her daughter.
tagline: 10 Songs, 10 Lives, 1 Night at the Gateway Motel
title: Lost Vegas Hiway
